name: BattleStations
description:
Single player campaign FPS test. I am using some story mode sets and units along with the low res multilayer units. This is a very alpha map which I am using to learn. Thank you to all the dedicated SC fans who have contributed to this effort. Please PM me if you are interested in working on a collaborative project.
